doc:
François Leterrier https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fran%C3%A7ois_Leterrier 0 François Leterrier, born 26 May 1929 in Margny-lès-Compiègne, is a French film director and actor. He entered the film industry when he was cast in Robert Bresson's film A Man Escaped. After this he went on to become a director himself. François_Leterrier , born 26_May_1929 in Margny-lès-Compiègne , is a_French_film_director_and_actor . He entered the_film_industry when he was_cast in Robert_Bresson 's_film_A_Man Escaped . After this he went on to_become a_director himself .
